GSD.product_version: versions from v5.0 to before v6.0.3
GSD.description:
memory: pl353-smc: Fix refcount leak bug in pl353_smc_probe()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 49605dc25e7fb33bf8b671279d4468531da90f89, it was introduced in version v5.0 by commit fee10bd2267868f2a3e7ba008ef7665aac5e4412. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: memory: pl353-smc: Fix refcount leak bug in pl353_smc_probe()
